SEARCH
Module io.github.ascopes.jct
Package io.github.ascopes.jct.containers

Interface Container

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Closeable
All Known Implementing Classes:
JarContainerImpl, PathWrappingContainerImpl
@API(since="0.0.1", status=EXPERIMENTAL) public interface Container extends Closeable
Container that wraps a file path source of some description.

Closing this resource will close any internally held resources that were opened internally. Already-opened resources passed to the implementation will not be closed.

Since:
0.0.1
Author:
Ashley Scopes

  • Method Details

    • contains

      boolean contains(PathFileObject fileObject)
      Determine if this container contains the path file object.
      Parameters:
      fileObject - the file object to look up.
      Returns:
      true if the object exists in this container, or false otherwise.

    • findFile

      @Nullable @Nullable Path findFile(String path)
      Find the physical path to a given string file path.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the file to find.
      Returns:
      the path if the file exists, or null if it does not exist.

    • getClassBinary

      @Nullable @io.github.ascopes.jct.annotations.Nullable byte[] getClassBinary(String binaryName) throws IOException
      Get the binary data for a class, if it exists.
      Parameters:
      binaryName - the binary name of the class.
      Returns:
      the binary data, if it exists, otherwise null.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an IO exception occurs.

    • getFileForInput

      @Nullable @Nullable PathFileObject getFileForInput(String packageName, String relativeName)
      Get a FileObject for reading, if it exists.

      If the file does not exist, null is returned.

      Parameters:
      packageName - the package name of the file.
      relativeName - the relative name of the file in the package.
      Returns:
      the file object, or null if it does not exist.

    • getFileForOutput

      @Nullable @Nullable PathFileObject getFileForOutput(String packageName, String relativeName)
      Get a FileObject for writing.

      If the container is read-only, null is returned.

      Parameters:
      packageName - the package name of the file.
      relativeName - the relative name of the file in the package.
      Returns:
      the file object, or null if this container is read-only.

    • getJavaFileForInput

      @Nullable @Nullable PathFileObject getJavaFileForInput(String className, JavaFileObject.Kind kind)
      Get a JavaFileObject for reading, if it exists.

      If the file does not exist, null is returned.

      Parameters:
      className - the binary name of the class to open.
      kind - the kind of file to open.
      Returns:
      the file object, or null if it does not exist.

    • getJavaFileForOutput

      @Nullable @Nullable PathFileObject getJavaFileForOutput(String className, JavaFileObject.Kind kind)
      Get a JavaFileObject for writing.

      If the container is read-only, null is returned.

      Parameters:
      className - the binary name of the class to open.
      kind - the kind of file to open.
      Returns:
      the file object, or null if this container is read-only.

    • getResource

      @Nullable @Nullable URL getResource(String resourcePath) throws IOException
      Get a classpath resource for the given resource path if it exists.

      If the resource does not exist, then return null.

      Parameters:
      resourcePath - the path to the resource.
      Returns:
      the URL to the resource if it exists, or null if it does not exist.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an IO error occurs looking for the resource.

    • inferBinaryName

      @Nullable @Nullable String inferBinaryName(PathFileObject javaFileObject)
      Infer the binary name of a given Java file object.
      Parameters:
      javaFileObject - the Java file object to infer the binary name of.
      Returns:
      the name, or null if the file does not exist in this container.

    • listAllFiles

      Collection<Path> listAllFiles() throws IOException
      List all files within this container.
      Returns:
      all files within the container, relative to the container base path.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file system failed to be read.

    • listFileObjects

      void listFileObjects(String packageName, Set<? extends JavaFileObject.Kind> kinds, boolean recurse, Collection<JavaFileObject> collection) throws IOException
      List all the file objects that match the given criteria in this group.
      Parameters:
      packageName - the package name to look in.
      kinds - the kinds of file to look for.
      recurse - true to recurse subpackages, false to only consider the given package.
      collection - the collection to fill.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file system failed to be read.
